thread.title: NOR KHAIRIAH

author: NOR KHAIRIAH
title: NOR KHAIRIAH
text: Most of the item, contents and listing of hotels is very easy to understand. No hidden fees. All clear information. As user, we need to double check the date, location and others. All the important information stated at the suitable places and easy to understand. Maybe need to improve a little bit striking colors or another factors to make this website more interesting. But for overall is very okay.
